        public void shutDown()

      • newHttpUriRequest

        protected org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpUriRequest newHttpUriRequest(String url)
        Creates a new HttpUriRequest for the given url. The default is to create a HttpGet without any further configuration. Subclasses may override this method and provide their own logic.
        参数:
        url - the url to be fetched
        返回:
        the HttpUriRequest for the given url
